00001 #ifndef LGM_WGS84_H
00002 #define LGM_WGS84_H

00004 // World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84) parameters
00005 #define WGS84_A         6378.1370               // semi-major axis of earth (equatorial radius) in km
00006 #define WGS84_B         6356.7523142            // semi-minor axis of earth (polar radius) in km ( derived from b=a(1-f) )
00007 #define WGS84_F         0.0033528106718309896   // f Flattening factor
00008 #define WGS84_FINV      298.2572229328697       // 1/f where f is flattening factor
00009 //#define WGS84_E2        0.006694380004260827    // first eccentricity squared ( e^2 = 1-b^2/a^2 = 2f-f^2)
00010 #define WGS84_E2        0.00669437999014    // first eccentricity squared ( e^2 = 1-b^2/a^2 = 2f-f^2)
00011 #define WGS84_E         0.08181919092890624     // first eccentricity ( e )
00012 #define WGS84_EP2       0.006739496756586903    // second eccentricity squared ( ep^2 = a^2/b^2-1 = f*(2-f)/(1-f)^2 )
00013 #define WGS84_EP        0.08209443803685366     // second eccentricity ep
00014 #define WGS84_A2        40680631.59076899       // WGS84_A * WGS84_A (km^2)
00015 #define WGS84_B2        40408299.98408706       // WGS84_B * WGS84_B (km^2)
00016 #define WGS84_A2mB2     272331.6066819355       // WGS84_A2 - WGS84_B2 (km^2)
00017 #define WGS84_E4        4.481472364144719e-05   // WGS84_E2*WGS84_E2
00018 #define WGS84_1mE2      0.993305619995739       // 1 - WGS84_E2
